alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:28AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN PREBLE AND WESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM EDT... At 728 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Eaton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Eaton, Camden, Lewisburg, West Alexandria, Gratis, Brookville, New Lebanon, Farmersville, Phillipsburg, Verona, Oklahoma, Wheatville, Pyrmont, Sugar Valley, Lake Lakengren and New Hope. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 5 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
